author: soomdog
title: Great location, clean rooms, but bad smoke smell from tenant next to us.
text: We stayed here for almost a week. The bar was cute and rooms were clean. The only downfall was that we stayed next to someone who lived in the hotel. She smoked and it stunk really bad. Location was great for us. I would stay here again as long as we weren't in the same room.
